document.title: Pellete de liens du 19-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Main Page - UbuntuLite ( via ) UbuntuLite is a fully-fledged Linux distribution that aims to be humane, user-friendly and featurefull, while still usable on some very old hardware. (Tags: linux ubuntu matos )
Styled Checkboxes ( via ) Customiser les checkboxes dans les formulaires HTML avec javaScript et CSS. (Tags: css webdesign xhtml forms )
Google Maps API ( via ) The Google Maps API lets you embed Google Maps in your own web pages. Sign Up ! (Tags: api googlemaps )
Phoogle Maps - PHP Mapping Class for Google Maps ( via ) Phoogle Maps (pronounced like Foogle Maps) is a PHP class that integrates itself with the Google Maps API to make an easy to use interface to display Google Maps on your site. (Tags: php api geolocalisation googlemaps )
Sftp Plugin Manual Manual of Klomp SFTP synchronizer plugin for Eclipse. Celui qui arrive a comprendre comment ca marche m'envoie un mail. (Tags: eclipse ftp plugin synchronisation )
Donut Cette page contient un programme javascript affichant un donut en rotation et en deplacement. Le donut a ete rendu en OpenGL puis retravaille sous un logiciel de traitement d'image. (Tags: javascript png animation xhtml )
